java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, GraphDataListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
JLayeredBarGraph, JStackedBarGraph
public class JBarGraph
extends JCategoryGraph2D

A bar graph Swing component. Multiple series are side-by-side.
